name: Mind's Eye (Waddell)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #39.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/minds-eye

In Mind's Eye you have to solve the puzzles by looking at them, and then execute the solution when the lights switch off.

Contains 4 puzzles. Unfortunately we ran out of time to implement the more difficult designs. Some of the graphics was also terribly rushed.

Controls are A/D or Left/Right arrows to move, space to jump. Backspace to retry the current level. Designed for 16:9 resolutions.

Audio powered by Wwise.

Changelog:

1/8/17: Removed surface-variable footsteps audio because it was buggy and made the character animation stop when he stops moving.

4/8/17: Fixed and re-added surface-variable footsteps, and fixed another sound effect not playing properly.
